item.title: verilator
item.description: Verilator is “the fastest free Verilog HDL simulator”. From a verification perspective it supports line coverage, signal toggle coverage and limited specification of functional coverage using SystemVerilog Assertions. It also allows one to write testbenches in C++ or SystemC.
